109.heading: Hen's Tooth Video.
109.title: Flesh Gordon [videorecording]
109.author: presented by Hen's Tooth Video and by Mammoth Films.
notes: First issued 1974 as a motion picture.
Cast: Jason Williams, Suzanne Fields, Joseph Hudgins, William Hunt, John Hoyt as Professor Gordon.

Summary: "In this popular outrageous spoof of sci-fi films, Earth is thrown onto carnal chaos by a mysterious sex ray emanating from outer space. Flesh Gordon, Dale Ardor and their new found friend Dr. Flexi Jerkoff, must travel to the planet Porno to save Earth from certain devastation by the mad Emperor Wang. Includes 10 minutes of previously unseen footage and original trailer.
"This program contains mature subject matter. It is intended for viewing by adult audiences, 18 years and older."

128.heading: "Hent Keris = Le Chemin de la Ville Basse" (Bran Ruzh, chapt.
128.author: Deschamps ; Auclair
notes: Introduction: "Contre l'histoire officielle de la France, Auclair et Deschamps ont bâti ce récit, à travers lequel ils partent à la recherche des peuples 'sans histoire', ceux qu'on appelle les 'minorités'. Ils entreprennent là une véritable chasse au trésor: Celle de nos anciennes langues anonymes; celle des traditions et des pensées enfoules qu'évoquent encore les bardes bretons d'aujourd'hui, lors des 'Fest nos vras', quand ils rendent vie à l'ancienne Armorique, à travers des légendes comme celle de Bran Ruzh, le corbeau rouge."

129.heading: Hentoff, Nat.
129.title: "Captain America's Restaurant"
129.author: by Nat Hentoff
notes: "After Vietnam, Americans will not, cannot, return to the old myths. Alice's Restaurant is closed, and Captain America and Bucky are dead. In different ways, angry young and old believe they can create their own nation."
